title: The Villain Deceived Me That He Was The Male Lead - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Childhood Friends   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Reverse Harem   Transmigration   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Dobby's dream   도비의꿈
description:
She became the villainess Laila Lorovante in an unfinished novel! She was an extra that was killed by another male lead candidate while harassing the male lead candidate’s crush and childhood friend, the heroine!

‘I’m pretty and rich. Why am I going to die?’

She decided to change her strategy and win the favor of the main characters from an early age! She decided to become the heroine’s close friend and a sworn enemy-like friend to the male lead candidates. The one-time pick male lead candidate taken by Laila was obsessed with her.

“Hold my hand Lala, then nothing will happen.”

Weren’t you the Male Lead? Perhaps… are you the Villain?>
